name: Crime Break
description:
In Crime Break you must use first person movement and point-and-click interaction to solve puzzles. However, only one mode can be active at a given time! The world also changes with the player, requiring you to change between modes to solver different puzzles.

This game was made for Mini Jam 60: Crime, where the theme was crime and pausing had to be a core mechanic. In crime break the default play mode is first person movement, but you have to pause the movement to interact with the world. You have to switch between these two modes to complete the game.

Controls

  • First Person Movement:  W, A, S, D + Mouse
  • Pause: Esc
  • Interact: Left mouse button (While the game is paused)
